data.title: Digital Fingerprint Extraction
data.content: Captures fingerprint images via mobile cameras and uses the SIFT algorithm to match them with existing databases for accurate identification.

data.title: Infrastructure Approval System
data.content: Automates the Khelo India infrastructure approval process with a transparent portal for real-time tracking and project validation.

data.title: Voyager
data.content: A travel chatbot that helps users with bookings, food recommendations, and emergency support using smart filters and quick responses.

data.title: Democratic Desk
data.content: Centralized platform for voter engagement with access to polling info, postal voting, slot booking, and demos for first-time voters.

data.title: Ecoledger
data.content: A blockchain-based platform for tracking carbon emissions and promoting active participation in sustainability efforts.

data.title: Xplore
data.content: Adventure app offering personalized experiences and real-time suggestions for outdoor enthusiasts.

data.title: Audio Emailr
data.content: Voice-enabled email client that reads messages aloud and supports commands for Gmail, Zoho Mail and Outlook. Built for hands-free access and accessibility.
